name: Gunslinger Jahangir
description:
A gunslinger, A cowboy, A life saver!

You are a cowboy named "Jahangir". You were hanging around a saloon while suddenly some bad cowboys kidnap a lady. Your job is to save the lady.

Entry for cowboy game jam~!

Features :

Gun/shooting mechanics

Special powers

Horses

Storyline

Gamepad support

Tips :

use WASD/arrow keys/gamepad to play.

press Spacebar/Y on gamepad to fire

Auto regeneration is there so just wait if you think you are dying and you will heal

hit the head of the enemy riding the horse for faster kill
